name: Gazebo Simulator for Franka Emika Panda robot
body:
A **Gazebo simulator** for the Franka Emika Panda robot with ROS interface, providing exposed **controllers** and real-time **robot state feedback** similar to the real robot when using the [*franka_ros_interface*](https://github.com/justagist/franka_ros_interface package.

  - Low-level *controllers* (joint position, velocity, torque) available that can be controlled through ROS topics (including position control for gripper).
  - Real-time *robot state* (end-effector state, joint state, controller state, etc.) available through ROS topics.
  - The [*franka_ros_interface*](https://github.com/justagist/franka_ros_interface) package (which is a ROS interface for controlling the real Panda robot) can also be used with the panda_simulator, providing direct *sim-to-real* code transfer. [Python API](https://justagist.github.io/franka_ros_interface/) also available.
  - Supports MoveIt planning and control for Franka Panda Emika robot and arm and Franka Gripper.

Dependency version requirements: 
 - [orocos_kinematics_dynamics](https://github.com/orocos/orocos_kinematics_dynamics) commit id: https://github.com/orocos/orocos_kinematics_dynamics/commit/b35c424e77ebc5b7e6f1c5e5c34f8a4666fbf5bc
